info.title: AirWatch Organization Group Management (System) REST API
info.description: AirWatch Organization Group Management (System) REST API V1

get.summary: New - Get favorites list for an admin
get.description: Returns set of saved favorites in sorted order by sortOder of link filtering out links which are not accessible based on organization group permissions.

parameters.name: adminId
parameters.description: Identifier for an admin on behalf of whom operation is to be performed(Required)

403.description: Forbidden 1.{6078: User does not have permission to perform this operation.}

post.summary: New - Add a new favorite to the favorites list
post.description: Save a given link/page in admin favorites list.

parameters.name: adminId
parameters.description: Identifier for an admin on behalf of whom operation is to be performed(Required)

parameters.name: favoriteRequest
parameters.description: New favorite to be added into favorites list. Favorite would have url, name(friendly name) and sortOrder.(Required)

403.description: Forbidden 1.{6078: User does not have permission to perform this operation}

get.summary: New - Get details for given favorite
get.description: Provides favorite details like displayName, url for a given favorite id

parameters.name: favoriteId
parameters.description: Id of favorite entity to be removed from list(Required)

parameters.name: adminId
parameters.description: Identifier for an admin on behalf of whom operation is to be performed(Required)

403.description: Forbidden 1.{6078: User does not have permission to perform this operation.}

404.description: Not Found 1.{6000: Admin not found} 2.{6077: Favorite not found}

delete.summary: New - Delete a favorite from favorites list
delete.description: Remove a favorite from favorties list of admin.

parameters.name: favoriteId
parameters.description: Id of favorite entity to be removed from list(Required)

parameters.name: adminId
parameters.description: Identifier for an admin on behalf of whom operation is to be performed(Required)

403.description: Forbidden 1.{6078: User does not have permission to perform this operation.}

404.description: Not Found 1.{6000: Admin not found} 2.{6077: Favorite not found}

get.summary: New - Get permissions for given admin
get.description: Get admin allowed permissions considering admin's active role along with privacy and SKU conditions for the OG which this admin belongs to

parameters.name: adminId
parameters.description: Optional adminId for which permissions to be fetched otherwise permissions are fetched for current admin

403.description: Forbidden 1. {6078: User does not have permission to perform this operation}

parameters.description: Sorting order. Allowed values are ASC or DESC. Defaults to ASC if this attribute is not specified.

get.summary:
Method to Save the android work settings
This method is used to mock and save the android work settings if all the parameters are available

get.summary:
Method to Create APNs Cert Request or Get the status of the APNs Configuration for an Organization Group
Upload certificate Blob Id is -1 when APNs is already Configured for the Organization Group

post.summary:
Method to Save the APNs Configuration for an Organization Group
This method is applicable after the APNs certificate Blob(.pem) is uploaded to the AirWatch server.

patch.summary:
New - Method to Update the APNs Configuration for an Organization Group
This method is applicable after the APNs is configured on the AirWatch server.

get.summary: New - Method to get the status of the APNs Configuration for an Organization Group
Provides application and content storage info for the specified organization group.
Retrieves Apps Based on user

New - Get method to fetch all the Registered Domains in Airwatch, 
which are eligible to be pushed to VIDM

post.summary:
New - Create the domain on VIDM if the domain is already registered with airwatch or
else register it with Airwatch and do not push it to VIDM.

get.summary:
Get Action Method for fetching blueprints for an Organization Group.
Only Applicable to Express Provisioned Organization Groups.

post.summary:
Saves the Blueprint
Only Applicable to Express Provisioned Organization Groups.

get.summary:
Retrieves the blueprint details of a blueprint in an Organization Group.
Only Applicable to Express Provisioned Organization Groups.

Delete Action Method for deleting blueprint having particular blueprintId
Only Applicable to Express Provisioned Organization Groups.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of blueprint to be deleted

patch.summary:
Modifies Name and AssignmentType of the Blueprint.
Only Applicable to Express Provisioned Organization Groups.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of blueprint to be deleted

parameters.name: blueprintModel
parameters.description: blueprintModel contains the properties of instance to be patched

post.summary:
Links the specified Blueprint with provided Apps.
If the Blueprint is already published, then Apps will be published asynchronously in some other process.
Only Applicable to Express Provisioned Organization Groups.

get.summary:
Retrieves resources for a blueprint.
Only Applicable to Express Provisioned Organization Groups.

post.summary:
Links the specified Blueprint with provided resource.
If the Blueprint is already published, then resource will be published.
Only Applicable to Express Provisioned Organization Groups.

delete.summary:
De links a resource from a particular blueprint
Only Applicable to Express Provisioned Organization Groups.

get.summary:
Retrieves Users for a blueprint.
Only Applicable to Express Provisioned Organization Groups.

post.summary:
Links the specified Blueprint with the provided users
Only Applicable to Express Provisioned Organization Groups.

Publish the Blueprint

Retrieves UserGroups for a blueprint.

get.summary: Searches for Enrollment Token and Device details using the query information provided.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: UserName of the Enrollment User for whom Enrollment Tokens needs to be searched.

parameters.name: userid
parameters.description: Identifier of the Enrollment User for whom Enrollment Tokens needs to be searched.

parameters.name: organizationgroupid
parameters.description: Identifier of the Organization Group where Enrollment Tokens needs to be searched.

parameters.name: organizationgroup
parameters.description: Organization Group Name where Enrollment Tokens needs to be searched.

parameters.name: serialnumber
parameters.description: Serial number of device for which Enrollment Tokens to be retrieved.

parameters.name: assetnumber
parameters.description: Asset Number of device for which Enrollment Tokens to be retrieved.

parameters.name: enrollmentstatusid
parameters.description: EnrollmentStatusID of device for which Enrollment Tokens to be retrieved.

parameters.name: compliancestatusid
parameters.description: ComplianceStatus of device for which Enrollment Tokens to be retrieved.

post.summary: Registers a device for the specified enrollment user.

get.summary: Retrieves enrolled device details for the query information provided in the request

parameters.name: organizationgroupid
parameters.description: Organization Group Identifier in which device details will be retrieved.

parameters.name: organizationgroup
parameters.description: Organization Group Name search parameter in which device details will be retrieved.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Platform filter for the device details to be retrieved.

parameters.name: customattributes
parameters.description: List of custom attribute names [separated by comma (,)] for which values should be returned.

parameters.name: serialnumber
parameters.description: Device serialnumber for which values should be returned.

parameters.name: seensince
parameters.description: SeenSince DateTime, devices registered after the seensince datetime will be returned if present.

parameters.name: seentill
parameters.description: SeenTill DateTime, devices registered till the seentill datetime will be returned if present.

parameters.name: enrolledsince
parameters.description: EnrolledSince DateTime, devices enrolled after the enrolledsince datetime will be returned if present.

parameters.name: enrolledtill
parameters.description: EnrolledTill DateTime, devices enrolled till the enrolledtill datetime will be returned if present.

get.summary: Retrieves registered device details

parameters.name: organizationgroupid
parameters.description: Organization Group Identifier in which device details will be retrieved.

parameters.name: organizationgroup
parameters.description: Organization Group Name search parameter in which device details will be retrieved.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Platform filter for the device details to be retrieved.

parameters.name: customattributes
parameters.description: List of custom attribute names [separated by comma (,)] for which values should be returned.

parameters.name: assetnumber
parameters.description: Asset number filter for the device details to be retrieved.

parameters.name: seensince
parameters.description: SeenSince DateTime, devices registered after the seensince datetime will be returned if present.

parameters.name: seentill
parameters.description: SeenTill DateTime, devices registered till the seentill datetime will be returned if present.

post.summary: New - Globalize given set of msgkeys as per given locale
post.description: Returns globalized singular and plural values as per given locale. Note all keys should be regular valid msg keys (No spaces in between, less than 50 chars) defined in Globalization Manager and should not be suffixed with .Plural for plural values. Api takes care of plural values for given key according convention followed while creating label keys in Globalization Manager.

parameters.name: globalizationRequest
parameters.description: Globalization request model having locale and keys, where locale is valid language code and keys are set of msg keys which needs to be globalized.(Required)

422.description: 1012 - Unprocessable Entity{ locale: Locale should be a valid culture code }

New - Retrieves the information for Help for supplied Organization Group Id.
Api call to get information about AirWatch version and API URLs. Replaces "https://{host}/API/v1" and "https://{host}/API/v2".
Retrieves the list of notifications based on the core user.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Optional. Start index for the list of fetched notifications. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Optional. Number of notifications fetched per page. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Optional. Option to fetch active/dismissed notifications. Value can be true or false. Default value is true.

parameters.name: cultureCode
parameters.description: Optional. Option to provide the locale setting for the fetched notifications. Default value is the default culture code for the core user.

post.summary: Creates a notification for admin or og depending on request.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Required. This parameter is used to direct the notification created for either og or admin. Possible values are og and admin.

get.summary: Retrieves the total, active and dismissed count of notifications.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Holds request entity coming thru call pipeline

FileName.description: Gets or sets FileName {Will be set in the content-disposition header}

IRequestQuery.description:
Interface for IAwRequestQuery
This will hold all the required data for a request. Will be filled from ModelBinder

QueryParams.description: Gets or sets Query Parameters. For e.g. any query string parameters will be extracted to key,value pair and stored here.

TenantContext.description: Gets or sets IAwTenantContext. Will hold the tenant details, which will be filled as part of the tenant validation handler

RequestMethod.description: Gets or sets RequestMethod. Will be used to write custom rules

AllowedUriQueryChars.description: Gets or sets allowed Characters in Query String.

ITenantContext.description: Contract for TenantContext. Will be exposed from RequestQuery and will be injected to every controller actions and Business method

TenantCode.description: Gets or sets TenantCode. Uniquely identify the tenant for the request

OrganizationgroupId.description: Gets or sets Organization Group ID

FavoritesListV1Model.description: List of admin favorites in sorted order by sortOrder property defined while creating a favorite

adminId.description: Indentifier for admin to whom these favorites belong

totalCount.description: Count of favorites saved in list

AddFavoritesRequestV1Model.description: Models a request for adding new favorite in the Favorites List of admin

sortOrder.description: Sort order of this new favorite in favorites list

isGlobalAdmin.description: admin is global admin or not

allowedResources.description: set of allowed resources for admin

LocationGroupId.description: Gets or sets the Location Group Id

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of role

Description.description: Gets or sets the description of role

Resources.description: Gets or sets the list of resources

ResourceName.description: Gets or sets the resource name

CategoryName.description: Gets or sets the category name

Allow.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether has access on resource

ServiceAccountEmail.description: Gets or sets Service account email for AFW

ServiceAccountClientId.description: Gets or sets the Client Id for Afw

ServiceAccountAdminEmail.description: Gets or sets the service account admin email address

EnterpriseId.description: Gets or sets the enterprise ID

AndroidWorkSetUpMode.description: Gets or sets the android work set up mode

CertificateSubjectName.description: Gets or sets the android work set up mode

AppleId.description: Gets or sets the AppleId. Apple account from which APNS certificate is created

CertificatePassword.description: Gets or sets the Cetificate Password

ApnsConfigurationModel.description: Apple Push Notification service Certificate Configuration

Inherit.description: Gets or sets the Inherit configuration of Certificate. When it is true, the Certificate will be inherited from parent OG.

CurrentSetting.description: Gets or sets CurrentSetting indicating APNs Certificate is inherited or overridden

FriendlyName.description: Gets or sets Device Friendly Name

ComplianceStatus.description: Gets or sets Device Compliance Status

EnrollmentStatus.description: Gets or sets Device Enrollment Status

Applications.description: Gets or sets the array of applications

ApplicationName.description: Gets or sets the name of application

BuildVersion.description: Gets or sets Application build version

Status.description: Gets or sets Status of the application, installation staus
